company_context: YugabyteDB: AI-Ready, Distributed, Postgres-Compatible Database Skip to content We're building something new and exciting...! Join the AI conversation with YugabyteDB on Discord to find out more. 10.1k / Sign In Get Started Try YugabyteDB Aeon Free Cloud database managed by us Download YugabyteDB Free open source database Book a Demo Personalized demo en English 日本語 Distributed PostgreSQL for Modern Apps Meet YugabyteDB, the AI-ready, multi-modal, distributed PostgreSQL database for cloud-native apps. Resilient, scalable, flexible, and 100% open source. 01. Play Overview 02. Request a Demo PostgreSQL++ PostgreSQL and Beyond. No Compromises. Get instantly productive with a PostgreSQL-compatible, multi-master RDBMS that supports stored procedures, triggers, and extensions. YugabyteDB elevates PostgreSQL with built-in connection management, observability, end-to-end security, and more. Built-in Resilience Built-in Resilience with Flexible Disaster Recovery Keep your application online and performant despite unplanned failures or scheduled maintenance. Meet (and exceed) your SLAs with YugabyteDB’s high availability and disaster recovery features, designed to work optimally across zones, regions, and clouds. Scalability Seamless Scalability Start small and add nodes as needed. Scale your data, connections, reads, and writes effortlessly without disrupting ongoing applications. As your needs grow, YugabyteDB automatically shards data and scales in all directions (up, down, out, and in). Global Design Patterns Versatile Design Patterns for Global Apps Design and deploy the perfect architecture for your global application. Choose from various blueprints and replication techniques to distribute, access, and update your data to achieve the right mix of latency, resilience, and consistency. Enterprise Capabilities Fit for Enterprise-Critical Applications Deploy and run your business-critical applications with confidence. YugabyteDB offers unparalleled enterprise capabilities, including next-gen AI features, seamless migration, reliable data protection, observability, backward compatibility, and end-to-end security. RAG and Gen AI Apps RAG and Gen AI Apps YugabyteDB provides advanced vector indexing capabilities that support enterprise-grade, ultra-resilient RAG and GenAI applications. Easily manage 100s of millions of vectors Ultra-low-latency vector query response times Even distribution of vector indexes across clusters Perform vector similarity searches using SQL Build with YugabyteDB MCP Server Integrations with LangChain, OLLama, LlamaIndex, AWS Bedrock, and Google Vertex AI PostgreSQL++ Built-in Resilience Scalability Global Design Patterns Enterprise Capabilities RAG and Gen AI Apps Techie Lo ♡ ed. Business Approved. Whether you’re an app developer, architect, operator, or leader, YugabyteDB has you covered. As a technologist, you’ll enjoy: Automatic data distribution for built-in resilience Intelligent scaling with automatic rebalancing Access to en

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi [CTO's Name], this is Alex from DeepData AI. I'm reaching out because I saw YugabyteDB's focus on AI-ready distributed PostgreSQL and thought our intelligent data processing platform might be a valuable complement for you.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Alex, thanks for the call. We're always looking at new technologies, but I have to be upfront, we're not actively looking for new data processing solutions right now. We're pretty invested in our current stack.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand completely. Many of our clients were in a similar position. What they found with DeepData AI is that it’s not just about replacing existing tools, but about significantly accelerating the insights you can derive from your YugabyteDB data, especially with the increasing demands of AI workloads. Can you tell me a bit about how you're currently handling real-time data transformation for your AI initiatives?

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: We've got a pretty robust internal pipeline. We've built custom ETL processes and use a few established orchestration tools. Frankly, the integration effort for something new is a significant hurdle, and we're at capacity with our current roadmap.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a very valid concern. DeepData AI is designed for seamless integration, often requiring minimal code changes. We can typically get a POC up and running in a matter of days, not weeks. We've found that by automating complex transformations, our clients free up their engineers to focus on higher-value tasks, rather than wrangling data.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: That sounds nice in theory, but I'm also responsible for budget. We've just gone through our Q3 planning, and any new significant software investment would require a lengthy approval process, likely for next fiscal year at the earliest. We're also seeing some interesting developments from competitors in the distributed database space that are giving us pause.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I appreciate the transparency about budget and timing. It sounds like your focus is very much on optimizing your current resources and strategic priorities. Given that, I don't think it makes sense for us to take up more of your time with a demo at this moment. We'll keep DeepData AI on your radar for future consideration.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Thanks, Alex. I appreciate you understanding. But no, this isn't something we can pursue at this time.

analysis.raw:
Score: 3
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Timing
Feedback: The seller should have tried to understand the buyer's future needs or pain points more deeply before accepting the "not actively looking" objection. Sentiment: Neutral

parsed.feedback: The seller should have tried to understand the buyer's future needs or pain points more deeply before accepting the "not actively looking" objection. Sentiment: Neutral
